law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Forensic science is a growth industry.
sentences.chinese: 法醫學是一個發展中的產業。

sentences.english: Body part is the state of development of sub-Song forensic discussion.
sentences.chinese: 正文部分是對宋代法醫學發展狀況的分段討論。

sentences.english: Represent a medicolegal document, attesting the presence of an active monitoring effort of the patient during anaesthesia.
sentences.chinese: 作爲法醫學文件，證明在麻醉期間存在監護。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the forensic identification and significance of amniotic fluid embolism (AFE).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討羊水栓塞致死的法醫學鑑定和意義。

sentences.english: The transitional period of Chinese forensic medicine is in Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 唐朝對法醫學來說，是一個承前啓後的時代。

sentences.english: The results provided the data for medicolegal expertizing.
sentences.chinese: 爲法醫學檢驗鑑定提供了實驗性資料。

sentences.english: Many crimes could not be solved without using forensic medicine.
sentences.chinese: 沒有法醫學，很多犯罪案件無法結案。

sentences.english: The work will appear in the journal Forensic Science Policy and Management. [Ashley Maxwell and Ann H.
sentences.chinese: 這項工作將會出現在法醫學政策和管理學雜誌上。
